loonR 0.2.15
  • Reference

    Count the class by each column

    Source: R/Subtyping.R
    countClassByColumn.Rd

    Count the class by each column

    countClassByColumn(df)

    Arguments

    df

    Value

    Examples

    data(Subtype.matrix)
loonR::countClassByColumn(Subtype.matrix)
#>          Count    Class          Column
#> MESCC1      35   MESCC1         BaiduII
#> MESCC2      44   MESCC2         BaiduII
#> MESCC3      38   MESCC3         BaiduII
#> MESCC4      35   MESCC4         BaiduII
#> NMF1        31     NMF1          BaiduI
#> NMF2        22     NMF2          BaiduI
#> NMF3        99     NMF3          BaiduI
#> CNV1        42     CNV1   CNVClustering
#> CNV2         7     CNV2   CNVClustering
#> CNV3       103     CNV3   CNVClustering
#> C1          86       C1     TCGASubtype
#> C2          66       C2     TCGASubtype
#> Subtype1    70 Subtype1 GSE53625Subtype
#> Subtype2    82 Subtype2 GSE53625Subtype
